price: 114. Jis (Allahas) sakys: „Jūs buvote ne (ilgiau) nei truputį, jei tik jūs būtumėt žinoję.“
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
